event.event-label: Netgear debug syslog message event: NTPServerVersionNotCompatible
event.descr:
The interface %interface% generated a syslog message: NTPServerVersionNotCompatible
Node ID: %nodeid%
Host: %nodelabel%
Interface: %interface%
Syslog severity: %parm[severity]%
OpenNMS severity: %severity%
Message: %parm[syslogmessage]%
Process: %parm[process]%
PID: %parm[processid]%
event.logmsg:
A Netgear debug syslog message has been received

Message: %parm[process]%: %parm[syslogmessage]%
